name: Long Live (Elijah Cobb)
description:
In the kingdom, the monarchs have one day of complete control. However, young monarchs have that privilege taken by their advisors. The only thing a teenage king can do is choose which direction to take. King Jesse is out of control of his kingdom, but that doesn't mean things can't change.

Long Live is a short text adventure made for the gmtk 2020 game jam.

It was finished 10 hours late, life gets in the way of game jams sometimes.
